title: Poster, "British Painting '74 - Hayward Gallery", 1974
medium: Ofset lithograph on textured wove paper
markings: Watermark across lower edge of sheet: CANSON & MONTGOLFIER - VID - ALONHLES - ANNONAY - ANC - MANUF
signed: In graphite upper right corner along edge: To Dan from Alan
inscribed: Imprinted in black below title at center: British Painting '74 Hayward Gallery / Arts COuncil of Great Britian 26 September to 17 NOvember 1974 / Monday to Friday 10 to 8 / Saturdays 10 to 6 / Sundays 12 to 6 / Admission 30p / Children, students and pensioners 15p / 10p all day Monday and between 6 to 8 Tuesdays to Fridays. Imprinted in black upper left corner along left edge: Design: Alan Fletcher/Pentagram. Print J&P Atchison
provenance: From the collection of Dan riedman
description: Hand painted letters in red, blue and black, drawn in a naive fashion with each letter resembling a pictograph. Each letter of the title, British Painting '74, is evenly spaced to form a grid.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, "British Painting '74 - Hayward Gallery", 1974.
1974. Ofset lithograph on textured wove paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-219.
